cab.content: Military Secret. 965309/ $ro7ft Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,21th June 1919.(Received 27th, 11.30 p.vn.)8766. No. 47. Part 1.1. Situation remains unchanged.2. Malleson's Herat agent reports that new Governor is discouraging Jehad (? corrupt group).Part 2.3. Reported some lighting occurred between Afghans and Chitralis in Bashgul on the 24th June. Chitralis reported to have withdrawn to Pattigul.4. Enemy patrols were active Peiwar front night of 24th-25th. June.5. Drazinda has been destroyed as punitive measure. Operation met with some opposition.6. Patrol encounter reported from Cham an front. Paragraph 3 not communicated to Press.
